insert into t_ticket (type_id, title, content, processor_id, department_id, priority, `status`, expect_finish_time, actual_finish_time, is_deleted, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time) values
(#{item.type_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.processor_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.department_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.priority,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.expect_finish_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.actual_finish_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.is_deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.create_by,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.update_by,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select ticket_id, type_id, title, content, processor_id, department_id, priority, status, expect_finish_time, actual_finish_time, is_deleted, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time from t_ticket where ticket_id = #{ticket_id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted = 0

select ticket_id, type_id, title, content, processor_id, department_id, priority, status, expect_finish_time, actual_finish_time, is_deleted, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time from t_ticket where is_deleted = 0 order by create_time desc

type_id = #{type_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

department_id = #{department_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},

`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
expect_finish_time = #{expect_finish_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where ticket_id = #{ticket_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
